main_definition: Appears to be a particular way, based on evidence or appearance rather than certainty.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Giving the impression of being (something in general)
Appearing to have a particular quality or characteristic
meanings_and_examples.example: His smile seems genuine, but I'm not sure.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Giving an impression of being (especially without proof)
meanings_and_examples.example: It seems like she didn't get enough sleep last night.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Appearing to be or do something in a particular way, especially temporarily
meanings_and_examples.example: The leaves seem green at the moment but might change color soon due to the weather.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Seemingly contradictory things taken together are possible
meanings_and_examples.example: He seems both confident and nervous before his presentation.
